heading: Create sign-in category
select: Select a sign-in category to start from
name: Title
enterTitle: Enter a title for this login
showOnTriageDescription: The description of your category will only appear on the category selection page if you have two or more categories enabled.
restrictions: Only the title and description of this category can be changed. All other options are inherited from the organization's settings.
loginNotAvailable: This login method is disabled by your organization and will not be shown to users.

errors.nameRequired: A title is required for all sign-in categories.
errors.authenticationMethodsRequired: At least one login method is required.
errors.socialProviderRequired: At least one social login provider is required.

1.title: Choose how to start
1.description: You can start with your organization login defaults, edit an existing sign-in category, or create a new sign-in category.

2.title: Title and description
2.description: Enter the title and description of your sign-in category.

3.title: Login types
3.description: Customize and order the logins that appear for this sign-in category.

createAccount.label: Create account link
createAccount.description: Allow the creation of a new ArcGIS account in this organization.

switchOrganization.label: Switch organization link
switchOrganization.description: Display a link that allows users to sign in to a different organization.

arcgis.label: ArcGIS login
arcgis.description: Allow users to sign in with their ArcGIS login.
arcgis.required: A title is required for the ArcGIS login method.

saml.label: SAML login
saml.description: Allow users to sign in with their SAML account.
saml.required: A title is required for the SAML login method.

oidc.label: OIDC login
oidc.description: Allow users to sign in with their OIDC account.
oidc.required: A title is required for the OIDC login method.

social.label: Social logins
social.description: Allow members to sign in to your organization using their login from the following social networks.
social.required: A title is required for the social logins method.

confirmLeave.title: Unsaved changes
confirmLeave.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
